summary: In 1942, Britain sends a group of British-trained Czech commandos to Prague to assassinate SS-General Reinhard Heydrich, head of the Nazi security services.
cast: Timothy Bottoms|Martin Shaw|Joss Ackland|Nicola Pagett|Anthony Andrews|Anton Diffring|Carl Duering|Cyril Shaps|Diana Coupland|Ronald Radd|Kim Fortune|Pavla Matéjuvská|Ray Smith|George Sewell|Reinhard Kolldehoff|Kika Markham|Philip Madoc|Nigel Stock|Cyril Cross|Vernon Dobtcheff|Frank Gatliff|Jirí Krampol|Radoslav Dubansky|Josef Abrhám|Josef Laufer|Jaroslav Drbohlav|Vítezslav Jandák|Aubrey Woods|John Abineri|Keith James|Gertan Klauber|Jan Kuzelka|William Lucas|Neil McCarthy|Jan Pohan|Zdenek Srstka
keywords: operation anthropoid|czech history|trapped in a basement|flooded basement|suicide by gunshot
title: Siete hombres al amanecer
